All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Ball
The Ball class extends the Walker class and represents a ball in the game.
Ball.Mode
The Mode enum represents the different modes a ball can have.
BallCollisions
This class handles the collisions in the game.
Collectable
This class represents a collectable item in the game.
FallingPlatform
This class represents a falling platform in the game.
Game
Main class representing the game.
GameLevel
This abstract class represents a level in the game.
Hypnotiser
Represents a Hypnotiser in the game.
KeyboardListener
Represents a KeyboardListener in the game.
Level1
Represents Level1 in the game.
Level2
Represents Level2 in the game.
Level3
Represents Level3 in the game.
Level4
Level4 is a class that extends GameLevel and represents the fourth level of the game.
Lever
Lever is a class that extends StaticBody and represents a lever in the game.
Mole
Mole is a class that extends StaticBody and represents a mole in the game.
MouseOnButtonListener
MouseOnButtonListener is a class that extends MouseAdapter and represents a mouse listener for buttons in the game.
MovingPlatform
MovingPlatform is a class that extends StaticBody and represents a moving platform in the game.
MyGameButton
class that represents all the buttons created in the game.
MyUserView
This class represents a UserView in the game.
MyWorld
This class extends World and represents world created in every level/frames.
PatrollerController
This class implements StepListener to allow a StaticBody to patrol between two coordinates.
PolygonEditor
Very basic polygon editor.
Portal
Represents Portals to allow teleport mechanism of ball.
Sound
This class represents sound and its controls in the game.
Spike
This class represents a Spike in the game.
Spring
This class represents a Spring in the game.
Tracker
This class represents a Tracker in the game.
